title: Man Shares Wife’s Life Hack On Making Him Do Errands In The House & It’s Relatable AF
text:
Man Shares Wife’s Life Hack On Making Him Do Errands In The House & It’s Relatable AF

Man Shares Wife’s Life Hack On Making Him Do Errands In The House & It’s Relatable AF

We cannot live without our trusty mobile phones period.

It's taken over our lives in ways unimaginable, from being the first thing we see in the morning and the last thing we see at night.

Picture For Representation

We have all used our phones get parents, siblings or husbands to pass things around because why move a muscle when all it takes is a press of the button.

A Twitter user painted this dependence on mobile phones in the most hilarious way possible.

The user named Paul Babar writes, 'I was watching tv with my wife who was eating and typing on her phone. My phone was kept for charging in the kitchen and I heard it ringing. I went & picked up the call, it was my wife, she said “can you bring the tomato sauce?'

'Ladies & gentlemen, I introduce you to my wife.'

Here's how people reacted:

#1

Damn smart wife.. I think I should get some lessons from her 😄😄 — Shivani Mittal (@Astro_Healer_Sh) October 21, 2019

Don't Miss 170 SHARES 16.5 K SHARES 110 SHARES 29.5 K SHARES 21.2 K SHARES

#2

Hiding tweet from wife..

Just incase she realises there are others who think like her and actually do it — cold monk (@fultoovella) October 21, 2019

#3

Can relate. I ask my husband to bring me my bed Tea like that 🤦‍♀️ — Geetha Raj (@geetharajin) October 21, 2019

#4

#5

Thanks for marrying her. You saved one for us. — अkshaय (@thrilllov) October 22, 2019

#6

His post got people talking, while many lauded his wife's amazing life hack to get her husband to do errands others related to the fact the mobile phone being the best means of communication even if you are a room away!

The convenience of this little gadget is what makes it the world’s most 'in demand' technological device and we know just how to abuse it at home.
